name: Letter Read
content: But all I have is your letter read and
I cannot get it out of my head
But you are not with me
And I have put so much into a life
I made too much about you now to lie
But all I have is your letter read and
I cannot get it out of my head
All I have is your letter read and
I cannot get it out of my head
But you are not with me
I make too much about you now to lie
Time passes by I hear nothing at all
But you are not with me
And I have put so much into a life
I made too much about you now to lie
But you are not with me
And I have put so much into a life
I made too much about you now to lie
But you are not with me
